Submodules¶

ukat.mapping.b0 module¶

ukat.mapping.b0.b0map(pixel_array, echo_list, unwrap=True, wrap_around=False)¶

Generates a B0 map from a series of volumes collected with 2 different echo times. It can also generate B0 map from a phase_difference image.

pixel_array4D/3D array

A 4D/3D array containing the phase image at each echo time i.e. the dimensions of the array are [x, y, TE] or [x, y, z, TE].

echo_listlist()

An array of the echo times in ms used for the last dimension of the raw data.

unwrapboolean

Optional input argument. By default, this script applies the scipy phase unwrapping for each phase echo image.

wrap_aroundboolean

Optional input argument. By default, this script does not apply the scipy wrap_around in the phase unwrapping for each phase echo image.

b02D/3D array

Array containing the B0 map unwrapped (rad/s) If pixel_array is 4D, then B0 map will be 3D. If pixel_array is 3D, then B0 map will be 2D.

ukat.mapping.dwi module¶

Diffusion-weighted imaging module

ukat.mapping.dwi.ivim(data, bvals, bvecs, mask=None)¶

Compute IVIM maps

Wrapper for dipy’s IvimModel from the reconst.ivim.py module to compute IVIM maps.

datanumpy.ndarray

4D image array [x, y, z, t]

bvalsnumpy.ndarray

b-values (N, )

bvecsnumpy.ndarray

b-values (N, 3)

masknumpy.ndarray

3D image array [x, y, z]

numpy.ndarray

S0 map

numpy.ndarray

D_star map

numpy.ndarray

D map

numpy.ndarray

f map

ukat.mapping.dwi.powder_avg(data, bvals)¶

“Powder average DWI time series

datanumpy.ndarray

4D image array [x, y, z, t]

bvalsnumpy.ndarray

b-values (N, )

data_panumpy.ndarray

Powder averaged 4D image array [x, y, z, b]

bvals_panumpy.ndarray

Powder averaged b-values (N, )

bvecs_panumpy.ndarray

Powder averaged b-vectors (N, 3)

The powder averaged b-vectors are defined as constants such that they have norm 1 for corresponding non-zero b-values

ukat.mapping.t2star module¶

class ukat.mapping.t2star.T2Star(pixel_array, echo_list)¶

Bases: object

Package containing algorithms that calculate parameter maps of the MRI scans acquired during the UKRIN-MAPS project.

See parameters of __init__ class

r2star()¶

Generates a R2* map from a series of volumes collected with different echo times. It calls t2star_joao().

See class attributes in __init__

r2star3D array

An array containing the R2* map generated by the function with R2* measured in seconds.

t2star_joao()¶

Generates a T2* map from a series of volumes collected with different echo times. It’s a rewritten version of t2star_nottingham with a few modifications.

See class attributes in __init__

t2star3D array

An array containing the T2* map generated by the function with T2* measured in milliseconds.

r2star : 3D array

t2star_nottingham()¶

Generates a T2* map from a series of volumes collected with different echo times.

See class attributes in __init__

t2star3D array

An array containing the T2* map generated by the function with T2* measured in milliseconds.

r2star3D array

An array containing the R2* map generated by the function with R2* measured in milliseconds.

m03D array

An array containing the M0 map generated by the function.
